altTitles.th: เลดี้อิงกริด

altTitles.fr: Ingrid, the White Deer: L'escapade risquée d'une jolie biche

description.en:
The beautiful daughter of the Farnese family is caught up in a whirlwind romance with a notorious royal playboy — it’s the scandal of the century! When the title of “Elvynee Deer” is awarded to the pure and lovely Ingrid Farnese, all of high society expects her to marry into foreign royalty. Cursed in love with a history of broken engagements, Ingrid is determined to stay put at home in Valentine Kingdom. To take control of her own future she’ll make the king’s illegitimate son, libertine and womanizer Regan Espencer, propose to her. But the problem is, Regan is the only man in the country who doesn’t want her hand in marriage! Will Ingrid survive being tossed into the throes of debauchery and reach her happy ending?  
  
Based on the novel by WhiteFence.

description.fr:
La belle fille de la famille Farnèse est prise dans une romance éclair avec un playboy royal notoire - c'est le scandale du siècle ! Lorsque le titre de «Elvynee Deer» est décerné à la pure et charmante Ingrid Farnèse, toute la haute société s'attend à ce qu'elle se marie avec une royauté étrangère. Maudite amoureuse d'une histoire d'engagements rompus, Ingrid est déterminée à rester chez elle dans le royaume de Valentine. Pour prendre le contrôle de son propre avenir, elle lui proposera le fils illégitime du roi, le libertin et coureur de jupons Regan Espencer. Mais le problème est que Regan est le seul homme du pays à ne pas vouloir sa main en mariage! Ingrid survivra-t-elle aux affres de la débauche et atteindra-t-elle sa fin heureuse?

description.th:
เคยรู้สึกไหมว่าชีวิตของตัวเอง แต่กลับตัดสินใจอะไรเพื่อตัวเองไม่ได้เลย… ตลอดชีวิตที่ผ่านมา เลดี้อิงกริดผู้เลอโฉมที่ทุกคนยกย่องว่าสง่างามเหมือนกวางขาวได้ใช้ชีวิตตามใจพ่อแม่มาโดยตลอด แต่เรื่องความรักไม่ใช่สิ่งที่คนอื่นจะตัดสินใจแทนได้หรอก สุดท้ายแล้ว การตัดสินใจครั้งแรกในชีวิตของเลดี้อิงกริดเพื่อความรักนี้ก็คือ...

description.vi:
Ingrid Farnese là cô gái đẹp nhất trong giới thượng lưu, người được mệnh danh là chú hươu trắng Elvynee. Nhưng đáng tiếc, hôn sự của cô không hề suôn sẻ như lời chúc phúc của mọi người. Hai lần đính hôn và cả hai lần đều thất bại. Lần này, cuối cùng cô gái bất hạnh ấy cũng bước chân vào gia đình hoàng gia, trở thành Vương phi của Quốc vương Severus.
Mỹ nhân đẹp nhất vương quốc và tay chơi khét tiếng trong thế giới ngầm của Elvynee, Công tước Regan Espencer – kẻ được gọi với cái tên Con rơi của vua. Mùa xuân năm ấy, một sự kiện gây rúng động thủ đô đã xảy ra…

description.zh:
描写社交界最放肆的才子公爵李根和最佳纯情美丽女性英格丽德的罗曼史。这是完全不相配的男女相遇相爱并逐渐变化的故事。
